title: Anyone want to join the TonyAbottFanClub (silverteam)?
body:
-CASUAL
-must be chill
-must not be verbally abusive
-must be able to take a loss well.
-must remember we are casual.

add me.

replies.body: Only if the team name is budgiesmugglers.
Am I allowed to change my name to Malcolm Turncoat and feed the other team? If so, yes. If not, yes anyway. Add RevolvingElk :)
I sent a request to you, can go wherever, sick of solo queue :)
I sent a request. Hope you still have slots free :)
